weka.core.stats

Class NominalStats

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class NominalStats
extends Stats
implements java.io.Serializable
    Class for computing nominal statistics (primarily frequency counts)

    $Revision: 10929 $
    Author:
    Mark Hall (mhall{[at]}pentaho{[dot]}com)

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.String label,
       double value)
        Adds to the count for a given label. If the label is null then it adds to the count for missing.
        Parameters:
        label - the label to add the count to
        value - the count to add
